definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more

sentences.english: How shall the ministry of the Spirit not be more in glory?
sentences.chinese: 何況那靈的職事，豈不更帶着榮光？

sentences.english: Plus, they are less trouble to their families and caretakers.
sentences.chinese: 何況他們也給家庭和看護者帶來更少麻煩。

sentences.english: Even a cat has limited number of lives.
sentences.chinese: 連一隻貓也只有屈指可數的幾條命，何況人乎？

sentences.english: China is still five years behind us, but it’s gaining.
sentences.chinese: 中國只是落後我們五年，何況人家還正在壯大。

sentences.english: How much more abominable and filthy is man, which drinketh iniquity like water?
sentences.chinese: 何況那可憎又腐敗，喝罪孽如同喝水的世人呢？

sentences.english: Moreover, the film's powerful cast is entirely a product of the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 更何況影片超強的演員陣容完全是應景產物。

sentences.english: Paranoid Here is a commendatory term, not to mention the fact that this is the case.
sentences.chinese: 偏執狂在這裏就是褒義詞，何況事實的確如此。

sentences.english: Moreover, these enterprises enjoyed the privilege of borrowing from state banks.
sentences.chinese: 更何況，這些公司享受到了從國家銀行貸款的特權。

sentences.english: He is so kind even to birds and beasts. He must be more merciful to human beings.
sentences.chinese: 他對鳥獸都如此仁慈，何況是對人呢？

sentences.english: Also there are reasons of state.
sentences.chinese: 何況，還有國家大事等着他呢。

sentences.english: Afortiori the influence of Moloch made them become sullen.
sentences.chinese: 何況莫洛克神的影響也使他們變得憂鬱起來。

sentences.english: What's more, one of the pillars of Cutié's popularity is his relationship counseling.
sentences.chinese: 更何況，對可愛的普及的支柱之一是他的關係輔導。

sentences.english: Moreover, the mother-child relationships deteriorated over time.
sentences.chinese: 何況這種母子關係是隨時間而衰退的。

sentences.english: The sacrifice of the wicked is detestable- how much more so when brought with evil intent!
sentences.chinese: 惡人的祭物是可憎的，何況他存惡意來獻呢。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
